title: Start
body:
<<outfit Aig Casual>>
<<expression Aig Neutral>>
<<outfit J-Pe Casual>>
<<expression J-Pe Angry>>
<<flip J-Pe>>
<<move Aig StageRight2>>
<<name Friendship Aig>>
Man, only one week left.
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
AAIIIIIGGGGG!!!!!
<<flip Aig>>
<<name Friendship Aig>>
Huh?
<<move J-Pe StageLeft1>>
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
What the FUCK is this?
<<name Friendship ...>>
He holds up his phone.
<<name Friendship Aig>>
Uh...my twitter page?
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
Why do you have more followers than me?!
<<name Friendship Aig>>
Huh?
<<name Friendship ...>>
You pull out your phone and open twitter.
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig Happy>>
Oh shit I'm blowin' up!
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
YOU MEAN YOU DIDN'T EVEN KNOW?!?
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig Neutral>>
I guess I don't really look at my phone that much.
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
WHAT?!?
<<flip J-Pe>>
*deep breath*
<<flip J-Pe>>
<<expression J-Pe Neutral>>
Listen, Aig. I like you, you're a good guy, but we've got to get some things straight here.
This is not a good look.
I am the frontman of XIX, alright? Do you know how bad it looks if I'm being shown up?
ON TWITTER NO LESS!
->You're the frontman?
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    <<expression Aig Angry>>
    I didn't think we had a frontman. I thought we were supposed to be a team.
    <<name Friendship J-Pe>>
    <<expression J-Pe Angry>>
    <<statDown Friendship J-Pe>>
    WHAT ARE YOU TALKING ABOUT!? I'VE ALWAYS BEEN THE FRONTMAN!
    <<expression J-Pe Neutral>>
    <<flip J-Pe>>
    I mean, we are a...group but..
    ..but..
    <<flip J-Pe>>
    <<expression J-Pe Angry>>
    Can't you just let me have this!?
    <<flip J-Pe>>
    <<move J-Pe OffStageLeft>>
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    <<expression Aig Neutral>>
    ...
    Yeesh.
->I'm sorry.
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    Sorry, man. I guess I've been spending a little too much time promoting myself.
    <<name Friendship J-Pe>>
    <<expression J-Pe Happy>>
    <<statUp Friendship J-Pe>>
    It's fine. As long as we're on the same page about it.
    <<expression J-Pe Neutral>>
    Just try cooling it with the promotion stuff for a bit.
    I know it probably sounds...stupid, but...
    I don't know...this stuff is important to me.
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    <<expression Aig Happy>>
    Yeah, no worries.
    <<name Friendship J-Pe>>
    <<expression J-Pe Happy>>
    Awesome.
    Thanks, my guy.
